title: copy_to_glacier_cumulus_translator Lambda Input
description: The input for the copy_to_glacier_cumulus_translator Lambda.

name.description: The key to use as files[0][name]. The name of the file (no prefix).

filepath.description: The key to use as files[0][filepath]. The object key (prefix/name).

filename.description: The key to use as files[0][filename]. The s3 uri of the file (s3://bucket/prefix/name).

bucket.description: The key to use as files[0][bucket]. The name of the bucket to copy from.

output_file_types.description: List of strings containing files types (extensions) to be output. If not supplied, all types will be output

granuleId.description: The unique ID of the granule.

files.description: The files to copy. See file_mapping for keys.
